alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northern Lake County; Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 26 at 9:46PM PST until February 28 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM MONDAY TO 4 PM PST TUESDAY ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow of 1 to 2 feet expected above 1500 feet, with locally higher amounts. Winds gust as high as 55 mph Monday morning with near blizzard conditions for a few hours along high elevations. 1 to 4 inches of snow accumulation may fall to as low as 500 feet tonight into Monday. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior, Northeastern Mendocino Interior, Southeastern Mendocino Interior, Northern Lake and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to 4 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, especially Monday. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
